about_me.des: I am a React and ROR developer with website and mobile development, automation Ops and writing scripts experience. Life is a continuous learning process, Understanding Nature is Science. I can make lots of friends when I coding and travel.

projects.Reach: Reach is a automated service for Truck management between Truck owner,Driver, Service Provider and IEP
projects.Potoo: Potoo is a admin side application to manage posts of social network
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am a freelancer worker in reactjs and react-native platform with our team contains four developers.
career.netease_des: In Spritle, I worked Ruby on Rails project I learned Cordova for android ans IOS mobile.
career.college_des: At May 2015,I graduated from college and started my IT technology tour.
